member.name: T:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator
member.summary: Runs code generation for every applicable document and handles resulting syntax trees, saving them to .

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.Compile
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of paths of files to be compiled.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.ReferencePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of paths to reference assemblies.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.PreprocessorSymbols
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of preprocessor symbols to define.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.PluginPaths
member.summary: Gets or sets the paths to plugins.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.IntermediateOutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the directory that contains generated source files.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.GeneratedFiles
member.summary: Gets the set of files generated after is invoked.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.AdditionalWrittenFiles
member.summary: Gets the set of files written in addition to those found in .

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.EmptyGeneratedFiles
member.summary: Gets the subset of that contain no types.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.ProjectDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory with the project file.

member.name: M:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.CompilationGenerator.GenerateAsync(System.IProgress{Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs the code generation as configured using this instance's properties.
member.param: Optional handler of diagnostics provided by code generator.
Cancellation token to interrupt async operations.

member.name: T:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.DocumentTransform
member.summary: The class responsible for generating compilation units to add to the project being built.

member.name: F:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.Engine.DocumentTransform.GeneratedByAToolPreamble
member.summary: A "generated by tool" comment string with environment/os-normalized newlines.
Produces a new document in response to any code generation attributes found in the specified document.
member.param: The compilation to which the document belongs.
The document to scan for generator attributes.
The path of the .csproj project file.
A function that can load an assembly with the given name.
Reports warnings and errors in code generation.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A task whose result is the generated document.
